detailed_reports.name: 张三
detailed_reports.target_text: Hello, hwo is the wether today?
detailed_reports.modified_text: Hello, how is the weather today?
detailed_reports.comment: 意思大致对应“今天天气怎么样”，但英文有明显拼写错误（hwo/wether），且表达不地道；更自然应为“Hello, how is the weather today?”或直接“How's the weather today?”。

detailed_reports.name: 李四
detailed_reports.target_text: I neeed a cup of coffe
detailed_reports.modified_text: I need a cup of coffee.
detailed_reports.comment: 意思翻译正确，但英文有拼写错误：'neeed'应为'need'，'coffe'应为'coffee'。

detailed_reports.name: 说话人
detailed_reports.comment: 译文准确自然，忠实传达“这是一个测试文本”的含义，无明显语法或用词问题。

detailed_reports.name: 王五
detailed_reports.source_text: 这个项目什么时候能完成？
detailed_reports.target_text: When thsi project can be finish?
detailed_reports.modified_text: When can this project be completed?
detailed_reports.comment: 语序不自然且语法错误较多：thsi拼写错误，应为this；can位置不当；be finish应为be finished或用will be finished。更自然的译法："When will this project be finished?" 或 "When can this project be finished?"
